mapper.select:
select m.`id`,m.`name`,m.`member_option`,m.`card_number`,m.`sex`,m.`depart_number`,m.`birthday_year`,m.`birthday_month`, m.`birthday_day`,m.`age`,m.`phone_1`,m.`phone_2`,m.`phone_3`,m.`province_code`,m.`province_name`,m.`city_code`, m.`city_name`,m.`area_code`,m.`area_name`,m.`card_type`,m.`master_card`,m.`minor_name`,m.`crowd_type`,m.`exclusive_customer`, m.`exclusive_customer_id`,m.`identity_type`,m.`identity_id`,m.`vocation`,m.`school`,m.`qq_number`,m.`email`,`address`, m.`postal_code`,m.`interest`,m.`source`,m.`integral_pasd`,m.`remark`,m.`register_time`,m.`status`,m.`state` from member m
and m.card_number like concat('%', #{cardNumber},'%') and m.`name` like concat('%', #{name},'%') and m.phone_1 = #{phone1} and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{dateNow} and FIND_IN_SET(m.company_id,#{companyId}) and m.`status` = 0 and m.state = 1

select count(*) from member m
and card_number like concat('%', #{cardNumber},'%') and m.`name` like concat('%', #{name},'%') and m.phone_1 = #{phone1} and DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{dateNow} and FIND_IN_SET(m.company_id,#{companyId}) and m.`status` = 0 and m.state = 1
mapper.update:
update optometry
`member_inumber` = #{memberInumber}, `mydriasis` = #{mydriasis}, `pharmacy_id` = #{pharmacyId}, `pharmacy` = #{pharmacy},
`corneal_astigmatism_os` = #{cornealAstigmatismOs}, `corneal_astigmatism_od` = #{cornealAstigmatismOd}, `sph_jyod` = #{sphJyod}, `sph_jyos` = #{sphJyos}, `cyl_jyod` = #{cylJyod}, `cyl_jyos` = #{cylJyos}, `axial_jyod` = #{axialJyod}, `axial_jyos` = #{axialJyos}, `va_jyod` = #{vaJyod}, `va_jyos` = #{vaJyos}, `pd_jyod` = #{pdJyod}, `pd_jyos` = #{pdJyos}, `sph_cpod` = #{sphCpod}, `sph_cpos` = #{sphCpos}, `cyl_cpod` = #{cylCpod}, `cyl_cpos` = #{cylCpos}, `axial_cpod` = #{axialCpod}, `axial_cpos` = #{axialCpos}, `dva_cpod` = #{dvaCpod}, `dva_cpos` = #{dvaCpos}, `nva_cpod` = #{nvaCpod}, `nva_cpos` = #{nvaCpos}, `add_cpod` = #{addCpod}, `add_cpos` = #{addCpos}, `distance_od` = #{distanceOd}, `distance_os` = #{distanceOs} `sphere_right2` = #{sphereRight2}, `sphere_left2` = #{sphereLeft2}, `cylinder_right2` = #{cylinderRight2}, `cylinder_left2` = #{cylinderLeft2}, `axial_right2` = #{axialRight2}, `axial_left2` = #{axialLeft2},
where member_inumber = #{memberInumber} and date_format(create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{createDate} and `mydriasis` = 0
mapper.delete:
delete from optometry where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select `id`,`member_inumber`,`mydriasis`,`sphere_right`,`sphere_left`,`cylinder_right`,`cylinder_left`,`axial_right`,`axial_left`, `corneal_astigmatism_os`,`corneal_astigmatism_od`,`sph_jyod`,`sph_jyos`,`cyl_jyod`,`cyl_jyos`,`axial_jyod`, `axial_jyos`,`va_jyod`,`va_jyos`,`pd_jyod`,`pd_jyos`,`sph_cpod`,`sph_cpos`,`cyl_cpod`,`cyl_cpos`,`axial_cpod`,`axial_cpos`, `dva_cpod`,`dva_cpos`,`nva_cpod`,`nva_cpos`,`add_cpod`,`add_cpos`,`distance_od`,`distance_os` from optometry where mydriasis=0 and member_inumber = #{cardNumber} order by create_time desc

select `id`,`member_inumber`,`mydriasis`,`sphere_right`,`sphere_left`,`cylinder_right`,`cylinder_left`,`axial_right`,`axial_left`, `corneal_astigmatism_os`,`corneal_astigmatism_od`,`sph_jyod`,`sph_jyos`,`cyl_jyod`,`cyl_jyos`,`axial_jyod`, `axial_jyos`,`va_jyod`,`va_jyos`,`pd_jyod`,`pd_jyos`,`sph_cpod`,`sph_cpos`,`cyl_cpod`,`cyl_cpos`,`axial_cpod`,`axial_cpos`, `dva_cpod`,`dva_cpos`,`nva_cpod`,`nva_cpos`,`add_cpod`,`add_cpos`,`distance_od`,`distance_os` from optometry where mydriasis=1 and member_inumber = #{cardNumber} order by create_time desc
